org.jclouds.abiquo.monitor

Interface VirtualMachineMonitor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MonitoringService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseVirtualMachineMonitor

    public interface VirtualMachineMonitor
extends MonitoringService
    VirtualMachine monitoring features.
    Author:
    Ignasi Barrera
